items.question: Vypi코te k칩dy a n치zvy v코ech p콏edm캩t콢.
Semestry se콏azen칠 podle roku sestupn캩.
items.expectedSql: SELECT name, year FROM semesters ORDER BY year DESC

items.question: P콏edm캩ty s k칩dem za캜칤naj칤c칤m na 'EBC'.
items.expectedSql: SELECT * FROM courses WHERE code LIKE 'EBC%' LIMIT 20

items.question: Z치znamy kde nikdo neprosp캩l na A.
items.expectedSql: SELECT * FROM success_rates WHERE grade_a = 0 LIMIT 20

items.question: K칩d p콏edm캩tu, semestr a po캜et zn치mek A.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.code, s.name, sr.grade_a FROM success_rates sr JOIN courses c ON sr.course_id = c.id JOIN semesters s ON sr.semester_id = s.id LIMIT 20

items.question: Fakulta a semestr pro ka쬯칳 z치znam.
items.expectedSql: SELECT f.name as fakulta, s.name as semestr FROM semesters s JOIN faculties f ON s.faculty_id = f.id

items.question: Dvojice r콢zn칳ch p콏edm캩t콢, kter칠 m캩ly v Zima 2024 naprosto stejn칳 po캜et zn치mek A.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c1.code, c2.code, sr1.grade_a FROM success_rates sr1 JOIN success_rates sr2 ON sr1.grade_a = sr2.grade_a JOIN courses c1 ON sr1.course_id = c1.id JOIN courses c2 ON sr2.course_id = c2.id JOIN semesters s ON sr1.semester_id = s.id WHERE s.name LIKE '%Zima 2024%' AND sr1.course_id > sr2.course_id AND sr1.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny' AND sr2.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny'

items.question: Agregovan칳 k칩d p콏edm캩tu, kter칳 m치 NEJVY먠먞 po캜et ne칰sp캩코n칳ch (F+FN) nap콏칤캜 v코emi semestry PEF.
items.expectedSql: SELECT c.code, SUM(sr.grade_f + sr.grade_fn) as celkem_fail FROM courses c JOIN success_rates sr ON c.id = sr.course_id JOIN semesters s ON sr.semester_id = s.id WHERE s.name LIKE '%PEF%' AND sr.term_name = 'V코echny term칤ny' GROUP BY c.id ORDER BY celkem_fail DESC LIMIT 1
